SEARCH
Package View.UtilityInterfaces

Interface Drawable

All Known Implementing Classes:
BlueEnemyGraphics, BombGraphics, BrownEnemyGraphics, ClownBossGraphics, CommandInfoGraphics, EnemyGraphics, EnemyGraphicsSpawner, EntityGraphics, FinalBossGraphics, GameOverScreen, LastEnemyGraphics, LevelGraphics, MatchGraphics, MenuGraphics, ObstacleGraphics, PauseGraphics, PlayerGraphics, PowerUpGraphics, RedEnemyGraphics, RocketGraphics, SettingsGraphics, StateGraphics, StatsMenuGraphics, UserView, WinGraphics, YellowEnemyGraphics
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface Drawable
This functional interface allows the classes that implement it to draw on the screen.
See Also:
  • Graphics

    void
    draw(Graphics g)
    Allows you to draw elements on the screen
